Function.Name: AboutToBeHitByItem
Function.Description: Called when a character is about to be hit by an item via the item ID so deflection can be tested.

Function.Name: abs
Function.Description: Returns the absolute value of a given value.

Function.Name: AcceptConnectionsFrom
Function.Description: Sets the acceptance of incoming connections from other objects by specifying the ConnectionType or passing the object reference.

Function.Name: AcceptConnectionsTo
Function.Description: Sets the acceptance of outgoing connections to other objects by specifying the object reference.

Function.Name: acos
Function.Description: Returns the arcus cosine of a given value.

Function.Name: ActivateKeyboardEvents
Function.Description: Activates listening for keyboard events.

Function.Name: AddDebugDrawRibbonPoint
Function.Description: Adds a point to a DebugRibbon by specifying the ID, its position, its color and its wIDth.

Function.Name: AddFileString
Function.Description: Adds a given string to an open file.

Function.Name: AddMusic
Function.Description: Adds music by specifying the path.

Function.Name: asin
Function.Description: Returns the arcus sinus of a given value.

Function.Name: assert
Function.Description: Asserts a given condition and halts script if not met.

Function.Name: atan
Function.Description: Returns the arcus tangent of a given value.

Function.Name: atan2
Function.Description: Returns the arcus tangent of the resulting quotient of the given values.

Function.Name: atof
Function.Description: Converts a given float value in string representation to a an actual float.

Function.Name: atoi
Function.Description: Converts a given integer value in string representation to an actual integer.

Function.Name: AttachMisc
Function.Description: Called when the player picks up a miscelaneous (non-weapon) item off the ground.

Function.Name: AttachWeapon
Function.Description: Called when the player picks up a weapon item off the ground.

Function.Name: Breakpoint
Function.Description: ????? Halts the script if this function gets called and displays the given value.

Function.Name: CanGoBack
Function.Description: Checks if' is possible to go further back in a UI.

Function.Name: ceil
Function.Description: Returns the ceiling value (rounding upwards) of a given value.

Function.Name: CheckSaveLevelChanges
Function.Description: ????? Checks if there is no unsaved level changes.

Function.Name: ClearTemporaryDecals
Function.Description: Clears temporary decals like blood splats and footprints.

Function.Name: ClearUndoHistory
Function.Description: Clears the undo history in the editor.

Function.Name: Collided
Function.Description: Called when a collision just happened that is stronger than a very light tap (light and resting collisions will be filtered out by this, but won't be by Contact().

Function.Name: ConfigHasKey
Function.Description: Checks if the given value exists in the config as a key.

Function.Name: ConnectedFrom
Function.Description: ????? Connects from a given object reference to a hotspot.

Function.Name: ConnectParticles
Function.Description: Connect two ribbon particles IDentified by their given IDs.

Function.Name: ConnectTo
Function.Description: ????? Connects a hotspot to a given object reference.

Function.Name: Contact
Function.Description: Called when any collision happens, including debouncing/resting collisions (which are filtered out and don't trigger other collision callbacks, such as CollIDed()).

Function.Name: cos
Function.Description: Returns the cosine of a given value.

Function.Name: CreateCustomHull
Function.Description: Creates a custom hull IDentified by a given key and described by the given vertices.

Function.Name: CreateIMGUI
Function.Description: Creates a new IMGUI and returns the reference to it.

Function.Name: CreateIMUIContext
Function.Description: DEPRECATED - DO NOT USE - Creates a new IMUIContext and returns the ID to it.

Function.Name: CreateObject
Function.Description: Creates a new object by loading the given model path and possibly excluding it from saving.

Function.Name: CreateSocketTCP
Function.Description: Creates and returns a new TCP socket by specifying the IP and port

Function.Name: cross
Function.Description: Calculates and returns the cross product of two three-dimensional vectors.

Function.Name: DeactivateAllMods
Function.Description: Deactivates all mods.

Function.Name: DeactivateKeyboardEvents
Function.Description: Deactivates listening for keyboard events.

Function.Name: DebugDrawBillboard
Function.Description: Draws an image (billboard) and returns its ID by passing a path, vec3 center coordinates, a scale, vec4 color and its lifetime length.

Function.Name: DebugDrawCircle
Function.Description: Draws a circle and returns its ID by passing its mat4 transformation, vec4 color and its lifetime length.

Function.Name: DebugDrawLine
Function.Description: Draws a line and returns its ID by passing its start and end vec3 coordinates, and a solID vec3 color or start vec3/vec4 color and end vec3/vec4 color and its lifetime length.

Function.Name: DebugDrawLines
Function.Description: ????? Draws multiple connected lines and returns their ID by the given vec3 coordinates and vec4 color along with their lifetime length.

Function.Name: DebugDrawPoint
Function.Description: Draws a point and returns its ID by the given vec3 coodinates, vec4 color and its lifetime length.

Function.Name: DebugDrawRemove
Function.Description: Removes a specific debug draw object by the given ID.

Function.Name: DebugDrawRibbon
Function.Description: Draws a ribbon and returns its ID by specifying ...

Function.Name: DebugDrawText
Function.Description: Draws a text and returns its ID by specifying a vec3 position, the text to print, its scale, screen space and its lifetime length.

Function.Name: DebugDrawWireBox
Function.Description: Draws a wirebox and returns its by specifying its vec3 position, vec3 dimension, vec3 color and its lifetime length.

Function.Name: DebugDrawWireCylinder
Function.Description: Draws a wirecyclinder and returns its ID by specifying its vec3 position, float scale, float height, vec3 color and its lifetime length.

Function.Name: DebugDrawWireMesh
Function.Description: Draws a wiremesh and returns its ID by specifying the path the object, mat4 transform, vec4 color and its lifetime length.

Function.Name: DebugDrawWireScaledSphere
Function.Description: Draws a scaled wiresphere and returns its ID by specifying the vec3 position, float radius, vec3 scale, vec3/vec4 color and its lifetime length.

Function.Name: DebugDrawWireSphere
Function.Description: Draws and wiresphere and returns its ID by specifying vec3 position, float radius, vec3 color and its lifetime length.

Function.Name: DebugKeysEnabled
Function.Description: Checks if the debug keys are enabled.

Function.Name: DebugSetPosition
Function.Description: Sets the position of an object IDentified by its ID to a vec3 position.

Function.Name: DebugText
Function.Description: Draws a debug text IDentified by a given key and its contents by a string and its lifetime length.

Function.Name: DeleteObjectID
Function.Description: Deletes an object IDentified by a given ID.

Function.Name: DeselectAll
Function.Description: Deselects all selected objects in the editor.

Function.Name: DestroySocketTCP
Function.Description: Destroys the tcp socket passed via a socket ID.

Function.Name: DialogueCameraControl
Function.Description: Called from character scripts, in order to determine if a dialogue rendered in a level script has camera control. That way character control scripts can avoid conflicts while they manipulate the camera.

Function.Name: DirectoryExists
Function.Description: Checks if the directory given by a specific path exists.

Function.Name: Disconnect
Function.Description: ????? Disconnects a hotspot from a given object reference.

Function.Name: DisconnectedFrom
Function.Description: ????? Disconnects a a hotspot from a given object reference.

Function.Name: DisplayError
Function.Description: Displays an error message with a given title and contents.

Function.Name: DisplayMatrixUpdate
Function.Description: Callback to handle time-based procedural skeletal animation effects that aren't animation controlled. This function gets triggered at the RiggedObject level, not at the MovementObject level.

Function.Name: Dispose
Function.Description: Called when a hotspot is destroyed, either by manually deleting it, or when the level is unloaded.

Function.Name: DisposeIMUIContext
Function.Description: DEPRECATED - DO NOT USE - Disposes a given IMUIContext identified by its ID.

Function.Name: DisposeTextAtlases
Function.Description: Disposes all created TextAtlasses.

Function.Name: distance
Function.Description: Calculates the euclidean distance between two vec2 or two vec3 coordinates.

Function.Name: distance_squared
Function.Description: Calculates the squared distance between two vec2 or two vec3 coordinates (NO squaring done like in distance()).

Function.Name: DoesItemFitInItem
Function.Description: Checks if an item fits item fits in another holstered item identified both by their IDs.

Function.Name: dot
Function.Description: Calculates the dot product of two given vec2 or vec3 vectors.

Function.Name: Draw
Function.Description: Draw serves as an update function for script-defined drawing. This is called both while in editor, and while not in the editor.

Function.Name: DrawEditor
Function.Description: DrawEditor serves as an update function for drawing. This is called only while the editor is active.

Function.Name: DrawGUI
Function.Description: DrawGUI is called after the main game scene is drawn. If you need to draw on top of other UIs that are drawn with DrawGUI, then see the DrawGUI2 and DrawGUI3 functions.

Function.Name: DrawGUI2
Function.Description: DrawGUI2 is called after the DrawGUI was called. If you need to draw on top of other UIs that are drawn with DrawGUI2, then see the DrawGUI3 function.

Function.Name: DrawGUI3
Function.Description: DrawGUI3 is called after the DrawGUI2 was called.

Function.Name: DuplicateObject
Function.Description: Duplicates an existing object identified by its object reference ID and returns the ID of the new object.

Function.Name: EditorEnabled
Function.Description: Checks if the editor is enabled.

Function.Name: EditorModeActive
Function.Description: Checks if the editor mode is active.

Function.Name: EnterCampaign
Function.Description: ????? Enters a campaign.

Function.Name: EnterLevel
Function.Description: ????? Enters a level.

Function.Name: FileExists
Function.Description: Checks if the file identified by the given path exists.

Function.Name: FinalAnimationMatrixUpdate
Function.Description: Callback to do character IK calculations. This function gets triggered at the RiggedObject level, not at the MovementObject level.

Function.Name: FinalAttachedItemUpdate
Function.Description: ????? Note: This function gets triggered at the RiggedObject level, not at the MovementObject level.

Function.Name: FindFirstCharacterInGroup
Function.Description: Returns the first character ID in a group which is identified by an ID.

Function.Name: FloatString
Function.Description: Converts a given float value along with the needed decimal digits to a string.

Function.Name: floor
Function.Description: Returns the floor value (rounding downwards) of a given value.

Function.Name: fpFromIEEE
Function.Description: Converts a given integer in IEEE 754 representation to its float representation.

Function.Name: fpToIEEE
Function.Description: Converts a given float value in float representation to its IEEE 754 representation.

Function.Name: FrameSelection
Function.Description: FrameSelection is called when the "frame selection" action called in editor.

Function.Name: GetActiveModSids
Function.Description: Returns an array of ModIDs of those mods which are currently active.

Function.Name: GetAnimationEventTime
Function.Description: Query the time an animation event occurs in an animation

Function.Name: GetBaseSkyTint
Function.Description: Returns the vec3 color of the base sky tint.

Function.Name: GetBuildTimestamp
Function.Description: Returns the timestamp Overgrowth was compiled at.

Function.Name: GetBuildVersionFull
Function.Description: Returns the full version of Overgrowth's version number.

Function.Name: GetBuildVersionShort
Function.Description: Returns the shortened version of Overgrowth's verision number.

Function.Name: GetCampaign
Function.Description: Returns the Campaign to a given campaign ID.

Function.Name: GetCampaigns
Function.Description: Returns an array of all Campaigns.

Function.Name: GetCharacters
Function.Description: Returns an array containing all IDs of the characters loaded in the level.

Function.Name: GetCharactersInHull
Function.Description: Queries the characters contained in a given hull with the hull's transformation information into an array (passed by reference).

Function.Name: GetCharactersInSphere
Function.Description: Queries the characters contained in a sphere described by a vec3 position and its radius into an array (passed by reference).

Function.Name: GetCodeForKey
Function.Description: Returns the integer key code for a given string keyboard key.

Function.Name: GetConfigValueBool
Function.Description: Returns a stored boolean config value identified by a string key.

Function.Name: GetConfigValueFloat
Function.Description: Returns a stored float config value identified by a string key.

Function.Name: GetConfigValueInt
Function.Description: Returns a stored int config value identified by a string key.

Function.Name: GetConfigValueString
Function.Description: Returns a stored string config value identified by a string key.

Function.Name: GetCurrCampaignID
Function.Description: Returns the ID of the current campaign ID.

Function.Name: GetCurrentLevelModsourceID
Function.Description: ????? Returns the current level mod's Steam mod ID.

Function.Name: GetCurrentMenuModsourceID
Function.Description: ????? Returns the current menu mod's Steam mod ID.

Function.Name: GetCurrLevel
Function.Description: ????? Returns the short path of the current level.

Function.Name: GetCurrLevelAbsPath
Function.Description: ????? Returns the absolute path of the current level.

Function.Name: GetCurrLevelID
Function.Description: ????? Returns the ID of the current level.

Function.Name: GetCurrLevelName
Function.Description: ????? Returns the name of the current level.

Function.Name: GetCurrLevelRelPath
Function.Description: ?????? Returns the relative path of the current level.

Function.Name: GetFileLine
Function.Description: Returns the current line of an already openend file handle.

Function.Name: GetFontFaceID
Function.Description: Returns the ID of a FontFace identified by its path and pixel height.

Function.Name: GetFriction
Function.Description: ????? Returns the friction of a given vec3 position.

Function.Name: GetHDRBlackPoint
Function.Description: Returns the HDR blackpoint of the curent level.

Function.Name: GetHDRBloomMult
Function.Description: Returns the HDR bloom multiplier of the current level.

Function.Name: GetHDRWhitePoint
Function.Description: Returns the HDR whitepoint of the current level.

Function.Name: GetIMUIContext
Function.Description: DEPRECATED - DO NOT USE - Returns the IMUIContext identified by a given ID.

Function.Name: GetInputDown
Function.Description: Checks if a given key is currently being pressed down by passing the controller ID and they key.

Function.Name: GetInputDownFiltered
Function.Description: Checks if a given key is currently being pressed down by passing the controlelr ID and the key along with a filter.

Function.Name: GetInputMode
Function.Description: ????? Returns the current input mode.

Function.Name: GetInputPressed
Function.Description: Checks if a given key was pressed by passing the controller ID and the key.

Function.Name: GetInputPressedFiltered
Function.Description: Checks if a given key was pressed by passing the controller ID and the key along with a filter.

Function.Name: GetLevelName
Function.Description: Returns the name of the level located by the given path.

Function.Name: GetLocaleNames
Function.Description: ????? Returns an arary of strings containing the names of all locales (languages).

Function.Name: GetLocaleShortcodes
Function.Description: ????? Returns an array of strings containing the short codes of all locales (languages).

Function.Name: GetLocaleStringForScancode
Function.Description: ????? Returns the localized string for a given scancode (keystroke).

Function.Name: GetLookXAxis
Function.Description: ????? Returns the value on which a given controller ID looks corresponding to the x-axis.

Function.Name: GetLookYAxis
Function.Description: ????? Returns the value on which a given controller ID looks corresponding to the y-axis.

Function.Name: GetMenuPaused
Function.Description: ????? Checks if the game is paused by being in the menu.

Function.Name: GetModSids
Function.Description: ????? Returns an array containing all ModIDs.

Function.Name: GetMonitorCount
Function.Description: ????? Returns the count of connected monitors to the computer.

Function.Name: GetMoveXAxis
Function.Description: ????? Returns the value on which a given controller ID moves corresponding to the x-axis.

Function.Name: GetMoveYAxis
Function.Description: ????? Returns the value on which a given controller ID moves corresponding to the y-axis.

Function.Name: GetNumCharacters
Function.Description: ????? Returns the amount of characters present in the current level.

Function.Name: GetNumHotspots
Function.Description: ????? Returns the amount of hotspots present in the current level.

Function.Name: GetNumItems
Function.Description: ????? Returns the amount of items present in the current level.

Function.Name: GetObjectIDs
Function.Description: Returns an array of integers containing all object IDs in the current level.

Function.Name: GetObjectIDsType
Function.Description: Returns an array of integers containing all object IDs of a given type in the current level.

Function.Name: GetObjectsInHull
Function.Description: Queries an array of integers containing all object IDs inside a given hull identified by its path and mat4 transformation information.

Function.Name: GetPossibleResolutions
Function.Description: ????? Returns an array of vec2 resolutions which are available on the display.

Function.Name: GetScreenHeight
Function.Description: Returns the height of the screen.

Function.Name: GetScreenWidth
Function.Description: Returns the width of the screen

Function.Name: GetSelected
Function.Description: Returns an array of IDs containing the currently selected objects in the editor.

Function.Name: GetSkyTint
Function.Description: Returns the vec3 tint of the sky in the current level.

Function.Name: GetSplitscreen
Function.Description: Checks if the game is splitscreen mode is active.

Function.Name: GetStringForControllerInput
Function.Description: ????? Returns the corresponding string for a controller input value.

Function.Name: GetStringForMouseButton
Function.Description: ????? Returns the corresponding string for a mouse button input value.

Function.Name: GetSunAmbient
Function.Description: Returns the sun ambient value of the current level.

Function.Name: GetSunColor
Function.Description: Returns the vec3 sun color of the current level.

Function.Name: GetSunPosition
Function.Description: Returns the vec3 sun position of the current level.

Function.Name: GetTempHealth
Function.Description: Returns the temporary health of the character.

Function.Name: GetTypeString
Function.Description: Called by other functions to retrieve the type of the functions owner hotspot.

Function.Name: HandleAnimationEvent
Function.Description: Animation events are created by the animation files themselves. For example, when the run animation is played, it calls HandleAnimationEvent("leftrunstep", left_foot_pos) when the left foot hits the ground.

Function.Name: HandleCollisionsBetweenTwoCharacters
Function.Description: Called when the game detects two characters have collided, so physics response impulses and possibly additional gameplay logic can be applied.

Function.Name: HandleEditorAttachment
Function.Description: Called when the player attaches an item to a character in the editor. (attachment_type is a member of the enum AttachmentType)

Function.Name: HandleEvent
Function.Description: HandleEvent is triggered when a movement object (usually a character) interacts with this hotspot. For the most part, this is event = "enter" or event = "exit", when a character enters or leaves the hotspot.

Function.Name: HandleEventItem
Function.Description: HandleEventItem is triggered when an item object interacts with this hotspot. For the most part, this is event = "enter" or event = "exit", when an item enters or leaves the hotspot.

Function.Name: HasFocus
Function.Description: Return true from this function if you are going to handle mouse input in this level script. This is particularly useful for menus that you draw yourself, such as the challenge level UI.

Function.Name: HexColor
Function.Description: Returns the vec4 representation of a given hex color code in string representation.

Function.Name: HitByItem
Function.Description: Called when the character is hit by an item so it can react to the impact, take damage, etc.

Function.Name: HotspotEnter
Function.Description: Triggered when any hotspot is entered by a movement object (such as a character, but not items).

Function.Name: HotspotExit
Function.Description: Triggered when any hotspot is exited by a movement object (such as a character, but not items).

Function.Name: IncomingTCPData
Function.Description: Networking hook function, for when network data comes in over a socket you've created.

Function.Name: Init
Function.Description: Called when a script is being initialized (loaded).

Function.Name: invert
Function.Description: Inverts a quaternion, mat4 or BoneTransform object.

Function.Name: IsControllerConnected
Function.Description: Check if a controller is connected to the PC.

Function.Name: IsGroupDerived
Function.Description: ????? Check if a group of objects is derived from another (copied).

Function.Name: IsKeyDown
Function.Description: Check if a given key specified by the key code is being held down.

Function.Name: IsValidSocketTCP
Function.Description: Checks if a given TCP socket identified by the socket ID is still valid.

Function.Name: IsWorkshopAvailable
Function.Description: Checks if the steam workshop is currently available.

Function.Name: IsWorkshopMod
Function.Description: Checks if a given mod specified by the ModID is a steam workshop mod.

Function.Name: IsWorkshopSubscribed
Function.Description: Checks if the user is subscribed to a given mod specified by the ModID on the steam workshop.

Function.Name: LeaveCampaign
Function.Description: Leave the currently entered campaign.

Function.Name: LeaveLevel
Function.Description: Leave the currently entered level.

Function.Name: length
Function.Description: Returns the length of a vec2/vec3 vector.

Function.Name: length_squared
Function.Description: Returns the squared length of a vec2/vec3 vector (much faster because it doesn't get square-rooted).

Function.Name: LoadFile
Function.Description: Loads a file and keeps the handle open for further use with other fiel functions by specifynig the filepath.

Function.Name: LoadLevel
Function.Description: Loads a given level specified by the file path.

Function.Name: LoadLevelID
Function.Description: Loads a given level specified by the level id.

Function.Name: LoadTexture
Function.Description: Loads a given texture specified by the file path and handling flags.

Function.Name: log
Function.Description: Returns the natural logarithm of a given value.

Function.Name: Log
Function.Description: Prints a string into the log console along with a specified LogType log level (severity).

Function.Name: log10
Function.Description: Returns the base-10 logarithm of a given value.

Function.Name: MakeParticle
Function.Description: Returns the ID of the particle to create by specifying the file path, its vec3 position, vec3 velocity and possible vec3 color.

Function.Name: max
Function.Description: Returns the larger value of two given integer or float values.

Function.Name: MediaMode
Function.Description: ????? Checks or sets?

Function.Name: min
Function.Description: Returns the smaller value of two given integer or float values.

Function.Name: mix
Function.Description: ????? Mixes two values of various (but same) data types together by providing the values and the blend value how much of the first value should be replaced with the second one.

Function.Name: ModActivation
Function.Description: Activates or deactivates a mod by providing the ModID and the boolean if it should be activated or deactivated.

Function.Name: ModCanActivate
Function.Description: Checks if a given mod specified by the ModID can be activated (checks for file/id-collisions with other active mods).

Function.Name: ModGetAllSpawnerItems
Function.Description: Returns an array of all added SpawnerItems of all mods, if necessary only by the active ones.

Function.Name: ModGetAuthor
Function.Description: Returns the author of a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetCampaignLevels
Function.Description: Returns an array of ModLevels of a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetDescription
Function.Description: Returns the description of a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetID
Function.Description: Returns the ID (unique mod ID) of a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetMenuItems
Function.Description: Returns an array of MenuItems of a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetName
Function.Description: Returns the name of a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetPath
Function.Description: Returns the path to a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetSingleLevels
Function.Description: Returns an array of ModLevels (single levels, NOT campaign levels) of a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetSource
Function.Description: ????? Returns the source (local = 0, steam workshop = 1) of a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetSpawnerItems
Function.Description: Returns an array of SpawnerItems of a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetTags
Function.Description: Returns the tags of a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetThumbnail
Function.Description: ????? Returns the path to the thumbnail of a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetThumbnailImage
Function.Description: Returns an IMImage reference tf the thumbnail image of a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetUserVote
Function.Description: Returns the UserVote to a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModGetVersion
Function.Description: Returns the version of a given mod specified by the ModID.

Function.Name: ModIsActive
Function.Description: Checks if a given mod specified by the ModID is active or not.

Function.Name: ModIsCore
Function.Description: Checks if a given mod specified by the ModID is a core mod (built-in) or not.

Function.Name: ModIsFavorite
Function.Description: Checks if a given mod specified by the ModID was favorited on the steam workshop by the user.

Function.Name: ModIsValid
Function.Description: ????? Checks if a given mod specified by the ModID is valid or not.

Function.Name: ModNeedsRestart
Function.Description: Checks if a given mod specified by the ModID needs a restart to work or not.
